BALZER LAB

Website: https://balzer-lab.org/
Institution: Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin
Field: Nephrology

Focus areas:
- Kidney cell adaptation, recovery, and failure in disease
- Fibroinflammatory niches in kidney disease
- Single-cell and spatial omics
- Personalized adaptation trajectories
- Peritoneum biology and translational models

Key pages:
- Research: https://balzer-lab.org/research/
- Team: https://balzer-lab.org/team/
- Publications: https://balzer-lab.org/publications/
- News: https://balzer-lab.org/news/
- Contact: https://balzer-lab.org/contact/
- Social: https://balzer-lab.org/social/

How to cite:
- Publication detail pages contain BibTeX, RIS, EndNote, and PubMed links

Last updated: 2026-02-11
